Id.description: UTC returns the time in UTC format.

Day.description: Day returns the day of the month.

Hour.description: Hour returns the hour within the day, in the range [0, 23].

Minute.description: Minute returns the minute offset within the hour, in the range [0, 59].

Month.description: Month returns the month of the year.

Second.description: Second returns the second offset within the minute, in the range [0, 59].

Unix.description: Unix returns a Unix time, the number of seconds elapsed since January 1, 1970 UTC.
